Html:
Hi,

The installation document refers to the VS 2010 installation (V2?), but the downloads are for VS2008 only (V1.6).

So - where is the VS2010 installation?

Thanks,

ron

For those who are also looking for the Visual Studio 2010 package, it is being actively developed and is almost ready for release.

We want to make sure that the VS2010 version is very stable and will not impact users of the previous versions before an official release is initiated.

For those willing to try the pre-release version, a recent download can be found in the downloads section (2.x versions)

Thanks!

( Edited 20110706 to instruct users to go to "downloads" section. )
